title: Make League Of Legends Great Again
body:
1) Riot need to get DuoQ out. Only have SoleQ ranked and Flex Ranked and this move would make Flex ranked really Clash mode where whole teams can clash in ranked...This would stop all higher lol players from carrying none skilled friends up the ranks in SoloQ and ruin your games.

2)Add Voice Chat to Ranked Games only with a mute Option in game under Tab to each player on team. This will improve games and players working together as a team

3) Other Options would help with smurfing players would be: Players wanting to play a champ in rank would need 7th lvl mastery on all champs being played in ranked games. Swapping would be allowed in champ select only if player playing champ has a 7th lvl Mastery on champ.

4) Get autofill out and rather wait longer then be autofilled. YES PLEASE... Many would agree on this because gameplay would be way more competitive as players have their role.

replies.body: See, I could MAYBE get on board with making ranked que a purely solo experience outside of flex, but the rest of your suggestions are patently absurd.

> [{quoted}](name=BlackKnightJack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Hhhk8rfL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-16T12:42:26.496+0000)
>
> See, I could MAYBE get on board with making ranked que a purely solo experience outside of flex, but the rest of your suggestions are patently absurd.

SoleQ would help in Ranked games a lot. Many players wouldn't be in their ranks if it wasn't helped by friends carrying them there but now they are playing in ranks tehy dont understand or have the skills to play in

having everyone on the same page would be a great! Not having to guess what everyone wants to do not would be a blessing. I don't understand  why this hasn't been done already. Pros play with chat why not everyone else in ranked anyway
Pros also all know each other. They have to live together. Solo queue is nowhere near the same thing as pro play.
you can always mute like any other mutliplayer game come on
I Agree just mute I use it all the time when i hear some kid with music up or kids crying in the background
I  agree with you Diggyman this would really make this game great again

Voice chat is the only one I'd like to see...


Removing DuoQ means that people have to play with 4 friends or none in ranked.

Quite a lot of people don't have 4 friends that are always willing to play at the same time as them.


Voice chat would improve communication a lot but could introduce it's own issues with toxic off hand remarks and and language/accent issues.


Requiring level 7 mastery for ranked is complete bs. This would mean players need to have at least 20 champions all level 7. This could result in someone been forced to play soraka jungle or Sion ADC. Simply because they don't have enough champions for the role.


Autofill has been talked about many times so I won't go into it.
To be fair, flex can be played with any amount of friends you want.
True but 5 is the main one since most people that are solid or in duo June do solo q
too many players being carried throughout ranked by higher elo friends, ruin games for higher elo players that really are good players
you can duo with your friends in flexQ dude please stop
Chat would really this game a lot. there are almost no game after 2014 that doesn't have voice chat ingame. League is the only one.
League does have voice chat, though. It just only works with premades. And thank fucking god for that.
but not in game like every other multiplayer game
You can always use a mute button if you want to chat or just listen in option. Riot can really help the teams this way
Or maybe I'd rather not have players find new and exciting ways to get tilted.

like what? I don't think there is a game out there with out voice chat now so i don't get why you wouldnt want it. It could only help I think. Saying that if they do put voice chat it would have to have a mute button ingame. easy

When you have voice chat then you have more information than is entirely necessary to trust teammates and can lead to you being tilted like the way their voice sounds or the way they say things. "Just mute them" doesn't fix the damage if it's already been done.

Oh man if they can get this done it would really help in higher elo. So many players are there because of their friends carrying them. You can see this in your games and on pro twitch streams everywhere. They really need this done.... SoloQ only! SoloQ only! No More DuoQ please!

Literally all of these are terrible.

Making it soloQ only just because you have no friends is pointless. It already fucking compensates for the coordination from you being in a duo. And what good does it actually do?

Voice chat is dumb. One of the biggest reasons I play League over other Mobas is that League *doesn't* do voice chat. "Oh just mute the screaming child" ah yes and put myself at a massive disadvantage.

Making m7 a requirement for rank would literally just *help* smurfs more than hurt them. Getting m7 without being absurdly lucky requires smurfing. It's not a test of skill, it's a test of fucking luck to see if things go perfectly enough for you to get an S. And it'd be grindy as fuck for everyone, so fuck that. **And** it'd just kill off champ trades in select.

And you can't just selectively enforce autofill. As soon as you make it optional the entire fucking thing falls apart, unless you add a hard and fast half-hour wait for not enabling it. It also forces you to learn other lanes like you fucking should be anyways.

You are wrong on this point buddy. SoloQ are for real players only not for butt buddies to help each other climb the ranks with no skills. Climb the ranks in FlexQ if you want to play with your butt Buddy
While I personally agree that I don't like duo queue, you have to understand it's fairly unreasonable to ask for it to be removed.

They can use Flex if they want to play with their friends, I don't see the problem. Only problem would be for the players that can't climb without any help from friends but voice chat would help with that a lot

But it does make it harder or more of pain to get mastery 7. They need to either spend blue ess or get a perm champ. It makes them work harder and most will just give up on the idea of going through all that crap just to get mastery 7

While I agree that making m7 a requirement for ranked is unbelievably stifling I do feel I have to say that you don't have to be a smurf or really lucky to get it. If you grind enough games and put the effort into playing the champion right you can still do it.
They could grid but at least they will know the champ enough to play in ranked games. I've seen some crazy gameplay and you have to so ya

Even if you're playing the champion right, you're still dealing with there being however many other people playing the champion right.

Unless by "right" you mean the right *time*, such as "less than an hour after a patch that buffs them goes live"
I get S and S- consistently with Darius even when I'm less than thrilled with my performance in a game and I would by no means call myself a smurf. I'm just really dedicated to the champion.
the m7 in ranked thing... while I get that grabbing garen shouldn't really need m7 I fully understand that it would be best to not see another first time yasuo
That's why you flame the shit out of him to make it crystal clear that you do not bring Yasuo into ranked if you do not know how to play him.

You wouldnt have to wait that long AT ALL. Maybe if youre playing in high challenger at early/late times, but I dont think youre high elo, let alone challenger. At worst you would wait maybe 5 mins, and even that isnt probable.

> Like wtf, why do you think riot added autofill in the first place? Its not like there is a "no autofill" pass that they are selling for money. People wasted their time without getting anything in return, I don't think the only reason was "lets make everyone's life worse".

Riot added autofill because higher elos had issues with longer wait times which are expected since the higher you go up the ladder you will see less and less people in that skill bracket.

And it only silghtly lowered queue times, but in return you get onesided matches because players are forced to fill roles they're not good at. 
So whats better, to get in the game sooner which would potentially be onesided or wait slightly longer to have an even match? 

As some1 who plays only ranked nowadays with the intention to climb I would take an even match any day.
Yes please... all these players being carried by friends in higher Elo is really messing up the game in ranked. I don't understand why they let it happen and do nothing about it
